articles.description: Researchers suggest that Antarctica will almost certainly experience more frequent and intense extreme events, such as ocean heatwaves and ice loss. As efforts intensify to keep global warming within the 1.5°C target set by the Paris Agreement, scientists cau…
articles.content:
Penguins and a seal on the Antarctic Peninsula. Credit: Prof. Anna E. Hogg, University of Leeds
